titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit Kentucky to operate a separate retirement system for certain public employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to permit Kentucky to operate a separate retirement system for certain public employees.
